goals__remit:
EuCheMS aisbl – European Association for Chemical and Molecular Sciences - is a non-profit making association. Its mission is to promote cooperation in Europe in the field of chemistry, education and policy related issues amongst those whose interests include chemical science and education.  
Its predecessor was founded in 1970. EuCheMS has over 40 member societies in more than 30 countries, together representing about 150,000 chemical scientists.
relevant_communication: Workshops on Circular Economy; Open Science; Employability of Chemists; Energy; All info and details available at http://www.euchems.eu/policy-and-communication/policy-workshops/
